message: I propose a 90/10 split.  It's a fair deal considering I'm the one proposing!
You proposed a 90/10 split, so I'll offer a 80/20 split. Fair is fair, right?
Okay, let's try 60/40.  This is a good compromise considering the inflation.
You're moving towards 50/50, but I think I can do better. How about 55/45?
